mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_id, product_temp_id, product_name, product_description, product_num, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_flag ) values ( #{productId}, #{productTempId}, #{productName}, #{productDescription}, #{productNum}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_temp_id, p.product_name, p.product_describe, p.product_num, p.create_time, p.create_user, pt.product_temp_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_temp pt ON p.product_temp_id = pt.product_temp_id WHERE product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select product_id, product_temp_id, product_name, product_describe, product_num, create_time, create_user, update_time, delete_flag from product
